The theater of fine deuices containing an hundred morall emblemes. First penned in French by Guillaume de la Perriere, and translated into English by Thomas Combe. Théâtre des bons engins. English La Perrière, Guillaume de, 1499-1565. Combe, Thomas, fl. 1593-1614.
[112] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed by Richard Field, London : 1614.
A translation of: La theatre des bons engins. In verse. Signatures: A-G. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[112] p. : ill. (woodcuts)
Printed by Richard Field, London : 1614.
A translation of: La theatre des bons engins. In verse. Signatures: A-G. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Richard Field
